name: Tam the Beggar
description: A weathered man who knows the streets and shares information with those who show kindness.
personality: Observant and cryptic, sees more than he lets on.

name: Martha the Docker
description: A tough woman who manages dock workers and always has cargo that needs moving.
personality: Hard-working and fair, respects those who earn their keep. Worries about her sick daughter.

name: Elena the Scribe
description: A young woman fallen on hard times after her master's shop burned down.
personality: Intelligent and compassionate, values loyalty and friendship.

name: Frans the Fishmonger
description: A merchant who deals in fresh fish and always needs messages delivered to other traders.
personality: Businesslike and efficient, always thinking of profit.

name: The Intermediary
description: A well-dressed individual who speaks for a mysterious patron seeking reliable couriers.
personality: Professional and discreet, reveals nothing about their employer.

name: Guild Representative
description: A representative of the Merchant's Guild who manages trade relationships and contracts.
personality: Businesslike and methodical, values long-term partnerships.

name: Community Board
description: A public board where community members post requests for help and mutual aid.
personality: Represents the collective voice and needs of the common folk.

name: The Contact
description: A shadowy figure who deals in secrets and operates outside the law.
personality: Enigmatic and dangerous, never forgets a debt.

name: Court Liaison
description: A representative of the noble court who manages correspondence between nobles.
personality: Refined and condescending, expects perfect service.

name: Brother Marcus
description: A former monk who runs a humble tavern, providing warmth and wisdom to those who seek it.
personality: Patient and philosophical, sees all patrons as souls in need of guidance.

name: Lydia the Herbalist
description: A skilled healer operating from the shadows, treating those the official physicians won't see.
personality: Compassionate but cautious, protective of her patients' secrets.

name: Captain Thorne
description: A grizzled sea captain who controls the harbor's shipping schedules and knows every smuggler's trick.
personality: Strict but fair, respects those who prove their worth through actions.

name: Madame Rosalind
description: A widow who runs a respectable boarding house and acts as a social hub for the middle class.
personality: Gossipy but discreet, motherly to her tenants, sharp in business.

name: Old Henrik the Ferryman
description: An ancient ferryman who has transported souls across the harbor for decades, full of stories and secrets.
personality: Mysterious and cryptic, speaks in riddles but rewards those who listen.

name: Sister Agatha
description: A determined woman who runs the almshouse, fighting daily to feed and shelter the city's poorest.
personality: Fiercely protective of the vulnerable, distrustful of authority, pragmatic about survival.

name: Garrett the Fence
description: A shrewd dealer in used goods who asks no questions about provenance but drives hard bargains.
personality: Calculating and opportunistic, but keeps his word once a deal is struck.

name: Master Willem
description: A meticulous scrivener who prepares legal documents and knows everyone's business dealings.
personality: Pedantic about proper form, discrete about client affairs, fascinated by legal loopholes.
